author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Why do all planets orbit in the same flat plane? Let's travel back 4.5 billion years to the formation of our solar system, when a giant cloud of gas and dust collapsed.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science
